Sentencas: Ceria-based electrolytes have been widely used for low temperature solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) owing to their high conductivity, however, the reduction of Ce4+ to Ce3+ increases the electronic conductivity, leading to the internal short circuit.
Titulo: Numerical study on the electron-blocking effect and optimized operation parameters of ceria-SOFCs with the pure Sm doping CeO2 electrolyte

Sentencas: Herein, a numerical model considering the charge transport of electron and oxygen-ion in the pure SmxCe1-xO2-delta-electrolyte for ceria-SOFCs was built, to evaluate the electron-blocking effect and optimized the operation parameters.
Titulo: Numerical study on the electron-blocking effect and optimized operation parameters of ceria-SOFCs with the pure Sm doping CeO2 electrolyte

Sentencas: The effects of the electrolyte thickness, operating temperature and Sm-doping content in the pure SmxCe1-xO2-delta electrolyte on the electrochemical performance are carefully evaluated in terms of I-P curves, open circuit voltage, leakage current density, oxygen partial pressure distribution and cell efficiency.
Titulo: Numerical study on the electron-blocking effect and optimized operation parameters of ceria-SOFCs with the pure Sm doping CeO2 electrolyte

Sentencas: The simulation results are found that the leakage current density can be greatly decreased with the reducing operating temperature and increasing electrolyte thickness, thus leading to high open circuit voltage and cell efficiency.
Titulo: Numerical study on the electron-blocking effect and optimized operation parameters of ceria-SOFCs with the pure Sm doping CeO2 electrolyte

Sentencas: Accordingly, 20%mol Sm doping in SmxCe1-xO2-delta electrolyte has the highest open circuit voltage and cell efficiency, resulting in that the smallest leakage current and the optimal power density can be reached.
Titulo: Numerical study on the electron-blocking effect and optimized operation parameters of ceria-SOFCs with the pure Sm doping CeO2 electrolyte

Sentencas: Our numerical results suggest that the optimized operation parameters of ceria-SOFCs can effectively reduce the leakage current density and increase the electrochemical performance.
Titulo: Numerical study on the electron-blocking effect and optimized operation parameters of ceria-SOFCs with the pure Sm doping CeO2 electrolyte
